title: Does form CM-110 (Case Management Conference) need to be filed with the Court, or just sent to other party?
question: I received a CM-110 from the other party. I understand I should file a CM-110 of my own.
answers: The CMC statement must be filed with the court and served on the other parties to the lawsuit. Good luck.

Yes, the Case Management Statement (CM-110) is required for each party (although parties can jointly submit a Case Management Statement). You must both file it with the court AND send a copy by mail to each party.
